mainText:
"Bank of Entitlement: Where your dreams become reality with a swipe of your entitled card!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I stroll into a fancy restaurant, wearing my finest designer suit and flashing my Bank of Entitlement card like it's made of solid gold. The matre d' practically bows as he seats me at the best table in the house. I order the most expensive champagne and caviar on the menu, making sure the entire place knows I'm someone important. But when my steak arrives, it's a few degrees below my liking. I call the waiter over, my entitlement oozing like a scent of superiority.I demand to speak to the chef, who trembles as I explain that my meal isn't up to my standards. He apologizes profusely and promises to personally cook me a new steak. Minutes later, a perfectly cooked, juicy steak arrives at my table.I take a big, dramatic bite, savoring the succulent flavor with a smug grin. The chef nervously asks how it is, and I reply, "Divine, of course. But next time, make sure it's cooked to perfection on the first try. My taste buds demand excellence, after all."As I leave, the restaurant staff practically fall over themselves to thank me for gracing them with my presence. And I walk out, feeling utterly entitled and completely justified in my over-the-top behavior. After all, when you're a valued customer of the Bank of Entitlement, the world truly does revolve around you.
